##Task 1

###Data Visualization - Cetaceans in Captivity

```{r wrangle1, message=FAlSE, warning=FALSE}

# look at captive births over the years by location  

acq_data <- cetacean %>% 
    filter(originLocation != "NA",
           originLocation != "Unknown",
           birthYear !="NA",
           acquisition =="Born") %>% 
  select(species, birthYear, originLocation) %>% 
  group_by(originLocation, birthYear) %>% 
  count()

# Lots of locations... consider grouping the locations into states?
# Need a list of the states for the locations:
# California - Marineland of the Pacific, SeaWorld San Diego, Six Flags Discovery Kingdom  
# Illinois - Brookfield Zoo, Shedd Aquarium  
# Florida - Discovery Cove, Dolphin Connection, Dolphin Research Center, Dolphin Plus Bayside, Dolphin Plus Oceanside, Gulf Wolrd Marine Park, Gulfarium, Marineland Florida, Miami Sequarium, Theater of the Sea
# International - Dolphin Quest Bermuda, Marineland Antibes, Marineland Canada, Sealand of the Pacific 
# Hawaii - Dolphin Quest Hawaii, Kahala Hilton Oahu, Sea Life Park 
# Georgia - Georgia Aquarium
# Minnesota - Minnesota Zoo
# Nevada - Mirage Dolphin Habitat
# Indiana - Indianapolis Zoo 
# Maryland - National Aquarium
# Massachusetts - New England Aquarium 
# Ohio - SeaWorld of Ohio, SeaWorld Aurora
# Texas - SeaWorld San Antonio 
# US Navy - U.S. Navy and U.S. Navy MMP 
# Unsure - Dolphin Experience 
```


```{r}
#stacked column graph 

ggplot(acq_data, aes(x = birthYear, y = n , group = originLocation, fill = originLocation))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```
